about_the_game:
Mystic Tavern Music is a collection of soundtracks that intents to evoke storytelling and world building moments in a Medieval Fantasy Environment.

- Content:
10 original tracks hand-crafted for immersive moments in the story of your game, including:
・4 Storytelling Tracks
・2 Tavern Music Tracks
・2 Town Theme Tracks
・2 Overworld Tracks

All tracks are at least 2 minutes long and loopable.

*******************************************
Audio: 10 tracks (wav, ogg, m4a)
*******************************************

・This pack is for use in Maker Series ONLY.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker.
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.
